Description:
Tbot Techno Systems, an IT Solutions and Services company, is seeking a Business Development Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will drive business growth and generate new sales opportunities by promoting our range of IT solutions and services. As a trusted partner, you will be responsible for building and maintaining strong relationships with clients while collaborating with the world's leading IT Original Equipment Manufacturers. Our tailored IT solutions are designed to meet our clients' specific business requirements, empowering them with cutting-edge technology while ensuring affordability. With us, you will have the opportunity to work in a dynamic and fast-paced environment and contribute to the digital transformation of various industries.Develop and implement strategies that drive business growth and revenue generation.
Generate new sales leads and convert them into opportunities.
Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, ensuring customer satisfaction.
Collaborate with OEMs to provide customized and seamless IT solutions across all platforms.
Conduct market research and analysis to identify new business opportunities.
Participate in networking events and conferences to promote Tbot Techno Systems' offerings.
Develop and deliver presentations and proposals to clients.Job Details
